stencils.title: Diagram
stencils.description: A UML Sequence Diagram
stencils.description_de: UML Sequenzdiagram
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="800"    height="600"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <g pointer-events="fill" >     <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <rect id="diagramcanvas" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="790" height="590" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white" />      <text font-size="22" id="diagramtext" x="400" y="25" oryx:align="top center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Frame
stencils.description: A frame for a whole diagram.
stencils.description_de: Ein Rahmen für das gesamte Diagramme.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="200 400"       id="actor">      <rect       id="border"       x="0"       y="0"          width="500"          height="600"          stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"   oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 150,25 165,8 165,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black"       font-weight="bold">       sd  </text>  <text       id="name"      font-size="12"        x="27"       y="2"      stroke="black"      oryx:anchors="top left"       oryx:align="top left"      oryx:fittoelem="border">  </text>       </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Human Actor
stencils.description: A human participant of a sequence diagram.
stencils.description_de: Ein menschlicher Teilnehmer eines Sequenzdiagramms.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <g oryx:minimumSize="64 10" oryx:maximumSize="64 9999999999999999">   <path id="line" d="M32,0 L32,500" stroke="black" fill="none"    stroke-width="4" stroke-dasharray="5, 3" oryx:resize="vertical"    oryx:anchors="top" />   <ellipse id="background" cx="32" cy="52" ry="53" rx="32" fill="white"    stroke="none" oryx:anchors="top" />    <ellipse id="head" cx="32" cy="14" ry="10" rx="10" fill="white"    stroke="black" stroke-width="2" oryx:anchors="top" />    <path    d="M 32 24 L 32 54 M 12 34 L 52 34 M 32 54 L 52 84 M 12 84 L 32 54"    stroke="black" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" oryx:anchors="top" />    <text id="text" font-size="12" x="32" y="92" oryx:anchors="top"    oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">   </text>   <rect id="border" oryx:resize="vertical" x="26" y="102" width="12"    height="400" fill="none" stroke-width="4" oryx:anchors="top"    visibility="hidden" />  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Actor
stencils.description: An object participating in the communication.
stencils.description_de: Ein Objekt, das an der Kommunikation teilnimmt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <g oryx:minimumSize="80 60" id="actor">   <path id="line" d="M40,0 L40,500" stroke="black" fill="none"    stroke-width="4" stroke-dasharray="5, 3" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal"    oryx:anchors="top" />   <rect id="invisibleborder" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="34"    y="81" width="12" height="400" fill="none" stroke-width="4"    visibility="hidden" oryx:anchors="top" />   <rect oryx:resize="horizontal" id="border" x="0" y="0" width="80"    height="80" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white"    oryx:anchors="top" />   <text id="text" font-size="12" x="40" y="40" stroke="black"    oryx:anchors="top" oryx:align="middle center" oryx:fittoelem="border" />   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Active Line
stencils.description: Shows that a participant is active.
stencils.description_de: Zeigt, dass ein Teilnehmer aktiv ist.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:magnets>          <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="50" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="70" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="80" oryx:anchors="middle" />         <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />      </oryx:magnets>    <g       oryx:minimumSize="10 10"       oryx:maximumSize="10 9999999999999999"       id="actor">      <rect       id="border"       x="0"       y="0"          width="10"          height="80"          stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"          oryx:resize="vertical" />        </g> </svg>

stencils.title: State Invariant
stencils.description: Notes an invariant which holds true for that actor.
stencils.description_de: Eine Invariante die für diesen Teilnehmer gilt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:docker oryx:cx="30" oryx:cy="15" />    <g       oryx:minimumSize="20 10"       id="action">      <rect       id="actionrect"          x="0"          y="0"          width="60"          height="30"       rx="10"       ry="10"       stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"          oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />          <text          font-size="12"          id="text"          x="30"          y="15"         stroke="black"          oryx:align="middle center"          oryx:fittoelem="actionrect">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Action
stencils.description: Notes an action which is done by an actor.
stencils.description_de: Kennzeichnet eine Aktion, die von einem Teilnehmer ausgeführt wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:magnets>      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="15" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="15" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />    </oryx:magnets>    <g       oryx:minimumSize="60 30"       id="umlobject">      <rect       id="border"       x="0"       y="0"          width="90"          height="50"          fill="white"          stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"          oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />          <text          font-size="12"          id="text"          x="45"          y="25"          oryx:align="middle center"          oryx:fittoelem="border"         stroke="black">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Lost Message
stencils.description: A message that goes somewhere unspecified.
stencils.description_de: Eine Nachricht deren Ziel nicht genauer spezifiziert ist.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="20 20"       id="umlstartnode">     <circle      id="circle"      cx="10"         cy="10"         r="10"         stroke="black"      stroke-width="2"      fill="black"/>     <text   id="text"    font-size="12"    x="10"   y="22"    stroke="black"   oryx:anchors="bottom"   oryx:align="bottom center">  </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Found Message
stencils.description: A message that comes from an unspecified source.
stencils.description_de: Eine Nachricht die von einer nicht genauer spezifizierten Quelle kommt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="20 20"       id="umlstartnode">     <circle      id="circle"      cx="10"         cy="10"         r="10"         stroke="black"      stroke-width="2"      fill="black"/>     <text   id="text"    font-size="12"    x="10"   y="22"    stroke="black"   oryx:anchors="bottom"   oryx:align="bottom center">  </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Option
stencils.description: The sequenceflow within this Combined Fragment is optional.
stencils.description_de: Der Sequenzfluss innerhalb des des kombinierten Fragments ist optional.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">  <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 30,25 45,8 45,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    opt  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Break
stencils.description: The sequenceflow within this Combined Fragment interrupts the sequenceflow of the frame it is contained in and is executed if the guardcondition becomes true.
stencils.description_de: Der Sequenzfluss innerhalb des des kombinierten Fragments ist unterbricht den Dequenzfluss des umliegenden Fragments udn wird anstatt dessen ausgeführt wenn die Guardcondition wahr wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 35,25 50,8 50,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    break  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: weak sequence
stencils.description: The sending of messages inside this combined fragment may happen in any order.
stencils.description_de: Die Nachrichten in diesem kombinierten Fragment können in einer beliebigen Reihenfolge verschickt werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 30,25 45,8 45,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    seq  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: strict sequence
stencils.description: The messages within this combined fragment must be send exactly in the modeled order.
stencils.description_de: Die Nachrichten innerhalb dieses kombinierten Fragments müssen genau in der modellierten Reihenfolge gesendet werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 30,25 45,8 45,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    strict  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Negative
stencils.description: Marks an invalid messageordering.
stencils.description_de: Kennzeichnet eine invalide Nachrichtenreihenfolge
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 30,25 45,8 45,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    neg  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Critical
stencils.description: The message flow within this combined fragment may not be interrupted.
stencils.description_de: Die Nachrichtenfluss innerhalb dieses kombinierten Fragments darf nicht unterbrochen werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 40,25 55,8 55,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    critical  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Assert
stencils.description: It has to be assertet that the message flow within this combined fragment happens.
stencils.description_de: Die Nachrichtenfluss innerhalb dieses kombinierten Fragments muss statt finden damit es einen validen Sequenzfluss ergibt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 40,25 55,8 55,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    assert  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Loop
stencils.description: The message flow within this combined fragment is repeated as long as the guard condition holds true.
stencils.description_de: Die Nachrichtenfluss innerhalb dieses kombinierten Fragments wird so lange wiederholt wie die guardcondition wahr ist.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 30,25 45,8 45,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    loop  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Alternative
stencils.description: This combined fragment represents an alternative similiar to if then else.
stencils.description_de: Dieses Fragment stellt eine Alternative dar, die sehr an Konstrukte wie if then else erinnert.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 200"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,200 0,200 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 30,25 45,8 45,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />   <path d="M 0,100 L 200,100" stroke="black" oryx:anchors="left right" stroke-dasharray="3, 4"/>        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    alt  </text>  <text     oryx:anchors = "left right"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="114"    stroke="black">    [else]  </text>          <text          id="text"          font-size="12"          x="5"          y="30"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top"          oryx:align="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Reference
stencils.description: This combined fragment represents a reference to another sequence diagram.
stencils.description_de: Dieses Fragment stellt eine Referenz auf ein anderes Sequenzdiagramm dar.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 80"       id="actor">      <polyline id="border" oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,0 200,0 200,80 0,80 0,0"      stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="top left" points="0,25 30,25 45,8 45,0"      style="stroke:black;stroke-width:2;fill:none" />        <text     oryx:anchors = "top left"    id="type"    font-size="12"      x="7"     y="14"    stroke="black">    ref  </text>           <text          id="text"          font-size="10"          x="100"          y="40"         stroke="black"         oryx:anchors="top left right bottom"          oryx:align="middle center"         oryx:fittoelem="border">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Terminator
stencils.description: Ends the lifeline of an actor so it can never again participate in the communication.
stencils.description_de: Beendet die Lebenslinie eines Teilnehmers, so dass er niemals wieder an der Kommunikation teilnehmen kann.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:docker oryx:cx="15" oryx:cy="15" />    <g       oryx:minimumSize="30 30"       id="umlterminator">        <path        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:3px;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-opacity:1"        d="M 0, 0 30,30"        id="path2985"/>     <path        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:3px;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-opacity:1"        d="M 0,30 30,0"        id="path2987"/>        <text    id="text"     font-size="12"     x="10"    y="34"     stroke="black"    oryx:anchors="bottom"    oryx:align="top center">   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: asynchronous Message
stencils.description: A message, that doesn't wait for an answer.
Eine Nachricht, die nicht auf eine Antwort wartet.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker     id="end"     refX="10"     refY="5"     markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse"     markerWidth="10"     markerHeight="10"     orient="auto">          <path       d="M 0 10 L 10 5 L 0 0"       fill="none"       stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"/>     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="controlflow">   <path     d="M50 50 L210 50"     stroke="black"     fill="none"     stroke-width="2"     marker-end="url(#end)"/>   <text     id="message"     x="0"     y="0"     oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: synchronous Message
stencils.description: A message, that waits for an answer.
Eine Nachricht, die auf eine Antwort wartet.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>     <marker id="end" refX="15" refY="6" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="15" markerHeight="12" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 1 L 15 6 L 0 11z" fill="black" stroke="black" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" marker-start="url(#start)" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="message" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: synchronous Answer
stencils.description: The answer to a synchronoues message.
Die Antwort zu einer synchronen Nachricht.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>     <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10" fill="none" stroke="black" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">      <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="message" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop" />  </g> </svg>
